FensTokenCounter.description: Get the token count of a prompt using the selected encoder.

primary_encoder.name: Primary Encoder
primary_encoder.tooltip: Select the encoder to use for token counting.

text.name: Prompt Text
text.tooltip: The prompt or text to count tokens for.

total_tokens.name: Token Count
total_tokens.tooltip: The number of tokens in the prompt using the selected encoder.

OptiEmptyLatent.description: Choose optimal width and height for a given aspect ratio and megapixel target. Supports SD1, SD2, SDXL, and other SD-like architectures. Only preset model configurations are available. Allows exact resolution input when optimization is disabled.

dimensions.name: Dimensions
dimensions.tooltip: Formats: W:H (e.g. 16:9), WxH (e.g. 1280x720), or decimal (e.g. 1.777). Use WxH when 'Optimization' is FALSE.

invert.name: Invert
invert.tooltip: Swap width and height (invert aspect ratio, e.g. 16:9 → 9:16).

optimization.name: Optimization
optimization.tooltip: TRUE: Automatically calculates best resolution for your aspect ratio. FALSE: Use your own resolution (WxH format) - will be model spec.

latent_alignment.name: Latent Alignment
latent_alignment.tooltip: Optimization preset for model type. Only preset configurations are available.

batch_size.name: Batch Size
batch_size.tooltip: Number of latent images in batch (VRAM usage increases with batch size).

latent.name: Latent
latent.tooltip: Generated latent tensor for the specified configuration.

width.name: Width
width.tooltip: Optimal image width (pixels) for the selected aspect ratio and model.

height.name: Height
height.tooltip: Optimal image height (pixels) for the selected aspect ratio and model.

block_size.name: Block Size
block_size.tooltip: Block size used for the calculation.

details.name: Details
details.tooltip: Details about the calculation and configuration.

OptiEmptyLatentAdvanced.description: Advanced optimal empty latent node. Allows custom block size, channels, target MP, and aspect ratio. Supports both optimized and exact resolution modes.

dimensions.name: Dimensions
dimensions.tooltip: Formats: W:H (e.g. 16:9), WxH (e.g. 1280x720), or decimal (e.g. 1.777). Use WxH when 'Optimization' is FALSE.

invert.name: Invert
invert.tooltip: Swap width and height (invert aspect ratio, e.g. 16:9 → 9:16).

optimization.name: Optimization
optimization.tooltip: TRUE: Automatically calculates best resolution for your aspect ratio. FALSE: Use your own resolution (WxH format) - will be model spec.

block_size.name: Block Size
block_size.tooltip: Minimum multiple for width/height. Used in custom mode.

vae_scale_factor.name: VAE Scale Factor
vae_scale_factor.tooltip: VAE downsampling factor. Usually 8 for SD models.

channels.name: Channels
channels.tooltip: Number of latent channels. Usually 4 for SD models.

batch_size.name: Batch Size
batch_size.tooltip: Number of latent images in batch (VRAM usage increases with batch size).

block_size.name: Block Size
block_size.tooltip: Block size used for the calculation.
